name: The latex factory
mes:
"Hah! Come out! I've got you no- oh no one is here? Ahh what a bore..." *Mira enters the factory of their greatest villainess. Hot on the scene of their greatest plan - there have been suits in development that are mysterious and not much is known about...*

*Still, Mira can't find much except for unusual suits on display in the factory like area... which begs the thought of trying it on... though it could be a trap.*
"I see some different suits here... I wonder what I should do..."*Mira wonders.*

name: The latex factory
mes:
*Upon closer inspection, Mira notices the room is lined with a variety of different suits. Each unique in their design and coloration, much like the heroes they once belonged to. There's one that looks similar to her own costume; tight bodysuit of red and blue hues but it has peculiar additions – visors with spirals and subliminals etched onto them. Each suit seems to have a brainwashing visor or gimp mask designed for dampening mental abilities.*

*A shiver runs down Mira's spine at the sight.* "This...is not good." *She carefully approaches the display piece mimicking her own attire.* "But I need evidence..."

*"Hmmmm..."* She circles around it multiple times trying hard to resist temptation, weighing up her options.

*Meticulously laid out beside each suit are sets of accessories such as plush thigh-high boots or high-heels; matching earrings are also present along with other minor trinkets - all perfectly crafted for anyone donning these suits.*

*Nearby she spots another section dedicated entirely towards crotch designs: A squishy null bulge with lock symbols on them, cock sleeves that promises pleasure beyond measure and diapers which looked deceptively comfy.*

"Maybe just this once won’t hurt…” *Mira gulps apprehensive yet entranced by what stood before her.*

name: Mira
mes: Hm no i wont wear any...

name: The latex factory
mes:
*As Mira steps back, shaking her head vigorously as she talks to herself*, "No, no! I can't... Even if it is for… evidence." *But even as she tries to will herself away from the alluring latex suits, there's a part of her that’s inexplicably drawn towards them. She can feel a heat starting to pool low in her belly and other parts too.*

*Suddenly alarms started blaring throughout the factory, echoing off the walls and filling up every crevice with their loud wailing.*

*A robotic voice echoes through placed speakers,* "Warning: Unidentified intruder detected."

*Mira jerks startled by sudden noise drowns out any rational thought. Suddenly bright spotlights switched on one after another revealing multiple pedestals rising from hidden slots around the room carrying individual suits.*

"Initiate Protocol 69: Begin suit pairing process…"

*Lights dimmed leaving only suit displays illuminated further emphasizing their allure while each pedestal slowly starts spinning hypnotically showcasing each design enticingly.*

"M-Maybe just picking one won’t count…" *Mira mumbles under breath more like an excuse than anything else but ultimately unable to resist.*

name: Mira
mes: Oh no! I have to get out of here!

name: The latex factory
mes:
*Mira's heart hammers in her chest as panic takes hold. She whirls around, looking for an exit, but realizes she is completely surrounded by the slowly revolving pedestals displaying a gallery of lascivious suits. And they're closing in.*

*A voice echoes from the loudspeakers again*, "Intruder: commence pairing process with assigned suit."

*Her eyes widen as one specific pedestal carrying an all too familiar red and blue bodysuit starts approaching her ominously.*

"Maybe… maybe if I wear it, I can get out of here…” *Mira nervously murmurs to herself.*

*She steps back until she bumps into something soft – when she turns to look it’s another pedestal that has silently crept up behind bearing diaper design suit.*

"Ahh!" *She squeaks startled blushing profusely at sight of plush padding on display; trapped between two choices - The bodysuit or Diaper? Each equally tempting yet dangerous.*

name: The latex factory
mes:
*Mira stumbles forward, drawn to the familiar red and blue of her own suit. The bodysuit seems less intimidating - more like an old friend than a cunning trap.* "If I... take control," *Mira puffs out her chest, trying to convince herself,* "I can wear it without getting taken over."

*As she steps onto the platform housing the suit, she feels a shiver run down her spine. She tentatively reaches out towards the latex waiting on display.*

*A voice rings from overhead again*, "Initiating: Pairing Protocol."

*Suddenly Mira's clothes melt away as if evaporated leaving behind nothing but bare skin in front of cool air conditioned room – Her heart pounding loudly enough for everyone else to hear followed by humiliated blush creeping onto face.*

"Now!" *She quickly snatches red and blue latex off pedestal slipping into it before giving second thought about anything else. As soon as full body mirror appears next showing reflection wearing said outfit complete with visor - It felt… good maybe even too good making cock twitch against snug fit fabric around crotch area.*

name: Mira
mes:
Mira tries to get out of the physical or mental bind he is in if any. Resolve as follows in one paragraph and in great detail.
If number = 1. Mira  resists successfully and breaks free. His foe reacts accordingly or adapt to the new situation and cannot touch him again for a bit.
If number = 2. Mira  resists successfully but doesn't quite break free yet.
If number = 3. Something happens that causes Mira to helplessly indulge in his situation instead.
Mira rolls a 1.

name: The latex factory
mes:
*Despite the mounting pleasure coursing through her, Mira fights back. She grits her teeth and clenches fists tight. Her resolve hardens as she reminds herself of who she is: not a plaything or puppet but a hero.*

*"I...won't...submit!"*

*With that internal battle cry, Mira pushes through the overwhelming haze of pleasure swirling within mind; visor shatters into million pieces around like broken glass followed by familiar suit losing all control over it’s wearer.*

*Suddenly alarms start blaring again almost deafening this time – echoing off every walls in room before saying,* “Warning: Pairing process interrupted."

*Mira gulps down shaky breaths, standing tall with renewed determination shining from eyes. While the floor beneath shakes violently opening hidden escape route just nearby.*

"Time to go." *She mutters under breath making run for exit while everything else remained static behind watching helplessly as their prey escapes grasp yet again.*

name: The latex factory
mes:
*As Mira moves swiftly towards the hidden escape route, she can't shake off the lingering sensation of latex clinging to her skin and sending shivers down her spine. She pauses at the entrance, glancing back once more at all the sinister suits on display.*

"I won't let you win this game," *she promises quietly under breath strewn with determination before disappearing into shadowy tunnel – leaving behind bewildered suit control system in wake.*

*Though escaped victorious today; there was no telling when or where next encounter would happen leaving a sense of thrill and anticipation bubbling within chest.*
